en.pp2: This Privacy Notice describes how Europa777 ('Europa777', 'We', 'Us', 'Our' or 'Company', as appropriate) collects, uses, stores, shares or maintains your personal information when you use our services through our website and mobile application.
en.pp3: It also describes your data protection rights, including the right to object to some of the processing we do.

en.pp10: Use of information and legal basis
en.pp20: We encourage you to read the Privacy Policy carefully and use it to make informed decisions. By visiting Company websites, mobile applications or other online properties, or creating an account through our Services, you indicate that you have read and understand this Privacy Policy.
en.pp21: 1. Your Agreement to the Privacy Policy
en.pp22: Agreement: By using the Service, you ('User' or 'you') agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy which may be changed by Us from time to time, except as We may separately request. When you provide Us with your data, you consent to receive promotional communications from: (a) Us; and also (b) third party providers of goods and services with whom we may share your data.
en.pp23: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any change will be effective immediately upon notice of such change being posted on the Sites. We therefore recommend that you visit this Privacy Policy from time to time to make sure you are aware of the current version and any changes we may make.
en.pp25: We collect two types of information from our users:
en.pp27: The first type of information we collect is information that identifies or can identify itself by reasonable individual effort ('Personal Information'). The Personal Information being collected may consist of the following:
en.pp28: Account Details: when you open an account and register to use the Services, you will be asked to provide us with certain details about yourself, such as: first and last name, email address, gender, date of birth, personal number and code, age, physical address, identification number, tax code, telephone number and occupation.
en.pp29: In addition, we may collect certain information as required by various gaming regulations, as well as Know Your Customer ('KYC') and Anti-Money Laundering ('AML') regulatory requirements, such as your source of funds.
en.pp30: Government Issued ID: In some cases, you may be asked to provide a copy of a government issued ID for the identity verification process. Please note that this information is required for certain features of our Services.
en.pp31: Gambling Information: In order for us to provide you with the Services, we automatically record different information related to your account and use of our Services, including in relation to your transactions, deposits, balances, wagers, withdrawals, bonuses and winnings. We also collect information about potential problem or addiction gambling, based on your patterns of gambling on our Services, in order to ensure a responsible gaming environment and as required by law.
en.pp32: Financial Information: In order for you to take advantage of all the features of the Services (e.g. place bets, make purchases, play in tournaments, etc), payment information will be collected, such as your currency, credit card number, payment method, and bank account details.
en.pp33: Voluntary Information: We also collect information that you provide to us voluntarily, such as information provided by our VIP customers.
en.pp34: For example, when you respond to communications from us, by email or by sharing additional information about yourself through your use of the Services, such as in the chat feature and in games.
en.pp35: This includes information you wish to share with us for the purpose of improving and developing our relationship with you, as well as to maintain your evaluation of our Services (for example, information about your marital and family status, your hobbies and interests and other information you share with us through surveys).
en.pp36: Device Information: We collect specific types of connection details and information regarding your device, software or hardware that can identify you, such as: unique device identifiers (e.g., UDID, IMEI, and MAC address), browser fingerprint, IP Address, and geolocation data.
en.pp37: Phone calls: we record or monitor phone calls for customer support, training, and/or security purposes.
en.pp38: Phone calls: we record or monitor phone calls for customer support, training, and/or security purposes.
en.pp39: When photos and videos are taken in which you appear as an attendee, speaker, sponsor or exhibitor, we may use these photos and videos for promotional purposes. We may also use your interview for promotional purposes (we quote you).
en.pp40: Social Networking: When you register through your social network account (such as your Facebook account) to use the Services or connect your player account to such account, we will have access to basic information from your social network account, such as your name, date of birth, profile picture and friend list, as well as information that you have made publicly available in such account.
en.pp41: In addition, when using the Services, you may, through your social network, 'Invite a friend' to use the Services
en.pp42: If the person accepts your invitation, we may obtain personal information from him/her such as: name, email address, phone number, and date of birth. We will use Personal Information for the purposes set forth herein and will only disclose such information to third parties as detailed in this Privacy Policy.
en.pp43: Information We Collect From Third Parties: We collect Personal Information from third party service providers, such as information about your credit history from credit bureaus and other financial information relevant to the provision of the Services, as well as information that is collected to verify your identity and prevent fraudulent or illegal activity.
en.pp45: The second type of information is unidentified and non-personally identifiable information belonging to a User(s) that may be made available or collected through the User's use of the Services ('Non-Personal Information').
en.pp46: The Non-Personal Information that is being collected consists of aggregate technical and usage information and may contain, among other things, the User's operating system: browser type, screen resolution, browser and keyboard language, 'click stream' and activity on the Services, the length of time the User visited the Services and related time stamps, etc.
en.pp47: For the avoidance of doubt, any Non-Personal Information connected or linked to any Personal Information shall be deemed Personal Information as long as such connection or link exists.
en.pp48: Types of non-personal information we collect from or about you:
en.pp49: Login History and Technical Information: To enhance the functionality of the Services and provide you with a better user experience, we collect technical information transmitted by your device, including certain software and hardware information (e.g., the type of browser and operating system your device uses, language preference, access time and domain name of the website from which you linked to the Services; etc).
en.pp50: Game Information: We may record game play information including, but not limited to, your deposits, wagers, bonuses, game session length, and your high scores. We may also share and publish this information on any of our Platforms.
en.pp51: Device and Connection Information: We collect information from the specific device you are using for security and fraud detection and prevention purposes.
en.pp52: For example, we may collect information about other software that is running simultaneously with the Software - to detect if you are using any software associated with fraudulent activity (e.g. bots, malware, etc.) or to check if the connection you are using is via VPN or proxy.
en.pp53: Analytics Information: We collect information about your use of the Services, such as application usage, login files, user activity (e.g. pages viewed, amount of time spent on specific pages, online browsing, click, actions, etc.), date/time stamps, alerts, etc.
en.pp54: This information is collected, among other things, for troubleshooting errors and bugs, as well as for research and analysis purposes regarding your use of the Services.
en.pp55: Anonymous Information: We may anonymize or de-identify information collected through the Services or through other means so that the information cannot, by itself, personally identify you.
en.pp56: Our use and disclosure of such aggregated or de-identified information is not subject to any restrictions under this Privacy Policy, and we may disclose it to others without limitation and for any purpose, such as advertising or marketing.
en.pp58: Conditions: We will process your information for various reasons, each of them prescribed by the relevant data protection laws.
en.pp60: Our processing of your personal information will be primarily necessary for us to provide the Service.
en.pp61: Occasionally, we may ask for your consent to process personal information in a discrete manner, in which case your personal information will be processed in accordance with such consent and you may revoke your consent in writing at any time.
en.pp62: As an example, your consent will be required to send you marketing communications and promotions. Please note that we will not share your data with companies outside our company for them to use for their own marketing purposes.
en.pp63: Fulfilling a contract, fulfilling a legal obligation
en.pp64: We may also be required to process your personal information when necessary for the performance of a contract or to comply with our various legal and/or regulatory responsibilities, including, but not limited to, complying with the terms of our gaming licenses and complying with any anti-money laundering legislation.
en.pp66: Finally, we may also process your personal information when we consider that such processing is in our (or a third party's) legitimate interest and provided that such processing does not adversely affect your interests, rights and freedoms.
en.pp67: Examples of processing pursuant to legitimate interests include:
en.pp68: (i) when we disclose your personal information following a restructuring or for internal administrative purposes;
en.pp69: (ii) when we identify certain companies that may offer you additional benefits to our Service or provide us with valuable information about your use of our Service;
en.pp70: (iii) detection and retention of information relating to persons with responsible gambling problems. Please note that if you self-exclude yourself on any of our Sites for responsible gambling reasons, such restrictions may be extended or replicated on accounts you may have with Europa777;
en.pp71: (iv) processing for purposes of ensuring network and information security, including preventing access to our electronic communications network;
en.pp72: (v) safeguarding the integrity of the sport by combating suspicious betting patterns, and reporting and sharing information related to such patterns;
en.pp73: (vi) meeting regulatory and statutory requirements; (vii) designing a customized reward scheme for players.
en.pp75: The Services are not designed for or directed at persons under the age of 18 ('The Legal Age of 18').
en.pp76: If you are not of legal age, you should not download or use the Services or provide any Personal Information to us.
en.pp77: We reserve the right to access and verify any personal information collected from you. In the event that we become aware that a user who is not of legal age has shared any information, we may discard such information unless necessary to fulfill any legal or statutory obligation binding on us.
en.pp78: If you have any reason to believe that a minor has shared any information with us, please contact us.

en.pp179: By law, you have several rights when it comes to your information. You can exercise any of these rights by contacting us using our contact information below. You can exercise any of these rights by contacting us using our contact information below.
en.pp180: The right to object to processing. You have the right to object to certain types of processing, including processing for direct marketing.
en.pp181: The right to be informed. You have the right to receive clear, transparent and easily understandable information about how we use your information and your rights.
en.pp182: Right of Access. You have the right to obtain access to your information (if we are processing it) and certain other information (similar to that provided in this Privacy Policy).
en.pp184: You have the right to have your information corrected if it is inaccurate or incomplete.
en.pp185: You may request that we rectify any errors in the information we maintain.
en.pp186: The right to erasure. This is also known as 'the right to be forgotten' and, in simple terms, allows you to request the deletion or removal of your information that we hold. This right is not absolute and will not apply where legitimate and compelling reasons apply.
en.pp187: The right to restrict processing. You have the right to 'block' or suppress further use of your information.
en.pp188: When processing is restricted, we may still store your information, but we will no longer use it.
en.pp190: You have rights to obtain and reuse your information for your own purposes across different services.
en.pp191: However, this is not a general right and there are exceptions.
en.pp192: The right to lodge a complaint.
en.pp193: You have the right to lodge a complaint about the way we handle or process your information with your national data protection regulator. See the How to contact us section below.
en.pp194: The right to withdraw consent. If you have given your consent to anything we do with your information, you can withdraw your consent to the processing of your information at any time.
en.pp196: If you have any questions or wish to exercise any of your rights, please contact us:
en.pp198: When you visit this page on our website:
en.pp199: If your country has a data protection authority, you have the right to contact it with any questions or concerns.
en.pp200: If we cannot resolve your questions or concerns, you also have the right to seek legal recourse before a national court.

en.pp203: They are sent back to the originating site on each subsequent visit, or to another site that recognizes these cookies.
en.pp205: for information on what cookies are and what they do.

en.pp208: Sometimes cookies are used to help ensure that the ads you see online are relevant to you and your interests.
en.pp209: We use cookies to track referrals to our Sites, remember your preferences and generate anonymous statistical data that we use to improve the user experience on our Sites.
en.pp210: We also use cookies to measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns, limit the number of times you see an advertisement, remember that you visited a site and provide advertisements that are more relevant to your interests.

en.wp1: As part of our commitment to providing truly superior service, we make every effort to ensure that your withdrawal request is processed as quickly and efficiently as possible.
en.wp2: All withdrawals go through an internal audit process to ensure that fraud prevention, money laundering, countering the financing of terrorism and other legal obligations and regulatory requirements are met.
en.wp3: As a result, withdrawals usually take 24 hours to process.
en.wp4: Europa777 has a multi-level authorization regarding deposit payments and withdrawals, so all withdrawals made by the Client have to go through an authorization process lasting from 24 to 96 hours.
en.wp5: The withdrawal made by the Customer must be executed in a timely manner and in accordance with the rules prescribed by the withdrawal policy and payment details policy.
en.wp6: For larger withdrawals, Europa777 may divide the amount into smaller withdrawals to facilitate the request. However, any withdrawal fees incurred will not be increased as a result of this segmentation.
en.wp7: Customers are required to verify their identity right after creating an account with us. The first step is the registration form, and depending on the payment methods used, there are various limits and parameters on when and if we request KYC.
en.wp8: A successful deposit through SEPA instant method accounts as verified ID and POA.
en.wp9: We have the right to request further explanations and/or supporting documents regarding customer identification, payment method, source of funds or wealth and/or any other necessary information we deem appropriate to satisfy our legal obligations and regulatory requirements.
en.wp10: WHEN FILLING OUT THE FORM FOR CASHOUT VIA BANK TRANSFER YOU MUST FILL IN BOTH IBAN AND SWIFT NUMBERS, NOT JUST ONE OF THEM.
en.wp11: If you encounter any obstacles when filling out the form or notice that your payment has not been processed for any reason, please contact our e-mail payment service -
en.wp13: Photographic Identification: A copy of a valid identification document with photograph is required.
en.wp14: This biometric document can consist of a scan of a Passport, driver's license, or Identity Card/Residence Card.
en.wp15: Specifically, it is the photo page of the ID that we require for our verifications. Make sure that your full name, photograph, full address, and signature are visible on the document.
en.wp16: Proof of address: This can be in the form of a utility bill, bank statement, or credit card statement. It must be a recent document (last 3 months) showing your full name and address as recorded on your account with us.
en.wp17: If you provide a credit card bill, be sure to delete the middle eight numbers from the credit card.
en.wp18: Authenticated documentation: Your documents may need to be authenticated by a properly qualified notary/solicitor, signed and stamped as proof of legitimacy upon our request.
en.wp19: Please keep the following in mind:
en.wp20: We do not accept black and white scans
en.wp21: The documents must be a PDF file or an image of the document.
en.wp23: We need both sides of the cards signed, we need to see the first 6 digits of the cards, as well as the last 4 digits, you must cover the other numbers as well as the CVV code.
en.wp24: You can send the documents here
en.wp25: or send them by e-mail to
en.wp26: Note: In some cases, depending on the payment method used to fund your account, you may be asked for one or a combination of the documents mentioned above, or additional documents not included in the list above.
en.wp27: We have the right to take the following actions after the above checks:
en.wp28: Cancel the withdrawal and return funds to the account when:
en.wp29: The client has not yet provided the requested documents
en.wp30: The customer's identification documents have expired
en.wp31: There are concerns about fraud / cheating / collusion / money laundering
en.wp32: The customer tries to withdraw after a player transfer; and
en.wp33: The payment method for which the withdrawal was requested is not the same as the deposit method
en.wp34: Please note the following important withdrawal information
en.wp35: (pertaining to credit card users and non-credit card users):
en.wp36: In some cases where account verification is required to complete your request, the verification must be completed within 7 days or your withdrawal will be reversed and the funds returned to your bank.
en.wp37: Please notify us immediately if your credit/debit card(s) are lost, stolen, or cancelled, or if your e-wallet status changes, so that we can investigate your status and confirm that payments may or may not be received.
en.wp38: Below, see the type of authentication required, as determined by the total amount of the customer's withdrawals per one (1) month period:
en.wp39: We reserve the right to delay and/or stop the processing of withdrawal requests until final approval is received for any pending deposit transactions.
en.wp41: Europa777's player transfer feature is intended to help players fund their accounts so that they can play at our tables.
en.wp42: Transferring funds must come from winnings and for security reasons, players are prevented from withdrawing transferred funds that originated directly from DEPOSITS or other transfers.
en.wp43: The player transfer feature is designed to allow players to fund their accounts so they can play at Europa777 tables; due to fraud and money laundering prevention measures, Europa777 needs to be particularly diligent in monitoring player transfers, which all players should appreciate.
en.wp44: Bonuses can be withdrawn only after all requirements of the Bonus Policy have been met.
en.wp45: Your bank or payment processor may charge a withdrawal fee. In the event that we cease offering our business in any particular country, payments will be subject to reasonable processing fees.
en.wp46: Europa777 will not be responsible for and will not compensate for any fluctuations in currency values from the time of the request until the time the transaction is completed.
en.wp47: We do not accept cash deposits, nor do we allow payment methods issued to third parties or in the name of a company.
en.wp48: Withdrawals requested within the same 24 hours as the deposit, using the same payment method, can be combined in a single payment.
en.wp49: In most cases, withdrawal payment credits will be posted as separate transactions and will not cancel the charges resulting from your deposit(s) to your Europa777 account.
en.wp50: If you have not actively used your chosen payment method to deposit to your account for more than 12 months, this withdrawal option may no longer be available.
en.wp51: We operate a closed-loop policy on deposits and withdrawals. Whenever possible, all customers should withdraw funds to the originating funding method/account.
en.wp52: If the customer has sent their original deposit(s) into their Europa777 account, up to the amount the customer deposited into Europa777 using the same payment method(s). Withdrawals above the deposit amount will be processed after a thorough review.
en.wp53: In case you cancel a withdrawal request, you are fully responsible for any subsequent use of your funds. The Company has no obligation to refund any amounts that are cancelled by you and are subsequently used, lost or transferred.

en.nrg12: Most people consider gambling as a hobby and are in complete control of their actions. However, there are a minority of gamers who are more susceptible to addiction, creating problems that affect their lives and the lives of those close to them.
en.nrg13: Often, these gamers are not aware that they have a problem, as gaming addiction leaves no physical signs like those found in cases of drug or alcohol addiction.
en.nrg14: Gambling can be fun and profitable. But you can't always win. Losing is part of the game, and you have to be prepared for it. Therefore, you should play responsibly and not risk money that you cannot afford to lose.
en.nrg15: Gambling can also be addictive and make you lose perspective on time and money. We want all your gambling experiences to be as positive as possible, even if you lose. Therefore, we work hard to help you take control of your own gambling.
en.nrg17: Gambling is a form of entertainment. It is not a way to get rich quick and pay your debts.
en.nrg18: Gambling is a game of chance. There are no formulas that guarantee gains.
en.nrg19: Make sure that it is your decision to play.
en.nrg20: Never try to chase your losses.
en.nrg21: Check the amounts you regularly spend at the Cashier.
en.nrg22: Make sure you know the rules of the games you play.
en.nrg23: Like many things, what is pleasant in moderation can be disastrous in excess.

en.nrg25: All Europa777 personnel are trained and aware of the problems caused by excessive gambling, as well as the symptoms that allow for the detection of such behavior.

en.frtm1: Europa777 is committed to high standards of customer service and to fair and open conduct in its gambling operations.
en.frtm2: The outcome of the Poker, Casino and Live Casino products, which Europa777 makes available to its customers, is determined by a certified and audited random number generator, which operates at a high level of encryption and randomness to ensure fairness without exception and no human interference (RNG).
en.frtm3: The RNG is administered by Casino and Live Casino providers and each of them has gone through and passed external compliance testing. This ensures that the games, once integrated into our website, perform as expected in terms of user experience.
en.frtm4: The Return to Player (RTP) value is a theoretical calculation of the average / expected percentage return of the total money bet over a large number of game plays (e.g. hundreds of million games).
en.frtm5: While you can win a big amount or lose your bet in any single gameplay, the average return of a specific game played over a long period of time will approach the Theoretical RTP value.
en.frtm6: This theoretical value is calculated either via analytical methods (which often is possible for non-strategy-dependent games such as slots) or via computer simulations of those more complex or strategy-dependent games (e.g. blackjack, roulette etc.)
en.frtm7: For more information about the fairness of specific games, please visit the information section of the relevant game. If you are unable to find this information, please contact our Customer Care team who will assist you further.
en.frtm8: By playing Casino games on our website, you acknowledge and agree that our RNG will determine the outcome of the games you play and that you will accept the outcomes of all such games.
en.frtm9: In the event of a discrepancy between the result that appears on your devices display and the game server, the result that appears on the game server will prevail. You further acknowledge and agree that our records will be conclusive in relation to any dispute arising out of your gaming activity on our website.
en.frtm10: For more info please contact our Customer Support team
